name: Icon plc
description: Icon plc is a global provider of outsourced development and commercialization services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device industries. Established in 1990 and headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, Icon has evolved into a leading Clinical Research Organization (CRO) with a strong focus on delivering high-quality services to its clients. The company offers a wide range of services, including clinical trial management, data management, biostatistics, regulatory affairs, and consulting. Icon operates in more than 40 countries worldwide, leveraging its extensive experience and innovative technology to expedite the development of new therapies and treatments. The company is committed to advancing healthcare by providing its clients with the insights and support necessary to bring groundbreaking medical products to market efficiently and effectively. Icon's mission emphasizes integrity, collaboration, and excellence, ensuring that they meet the highest standards in the industry. With a robust portfolio of clients, including some of the largest pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies, Icon plc is dedicated to supporting the entire lifecycle of drug development from preclinical studies through post-market surveillance.

seo.meta_title: Icon plc | Global Provider of Outsourced Development Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Icon plc, a leading Clinical Research Organization providing outsourced development and commercialization services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries.

faq.question: What services does Icon plc provide?
faq.answer: Icon plc provides outsourced development and commercialization services including clinical trial management, data management, biostatistics, and regulatory affairs.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Icon plc?
faq.answer: Steve Cutler is the CEO of Icon plc.

faq.question: Where is Icon plc headquartered?
faq.answer: Icon plc is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
